```{r}
pacman::p_load("lterdatasampler", "tidyverse", "ggthemes")
```

```{r}
pie_crab
```

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "i got it"
ggplot(pie_crab, aes(size, latitude)) +
  geom_point(color = "#CCCCCC") +
  theme_solarized_2(light = FALSE)
```

```{r}
crab_sub <- pie_crab %>% 
  group_by(site) %>% 
  summarize(crab_mean = round(mean(size),2),
            crab_sd = sd(size),
            crab_count = n())
```
